nodes.text: The Biox Detour was a hyperspace trade route that former pirate Queen Maz Kanata marked as one of the "real" trade routes for smugglers to use, rather than official ones, in a map she included in the book that would become known as the Smuggler's Guide. The route connected the planet Takodana in the Mid Rim to the mining colony known as the Ring of Kafrene in the Expansion Region, which acted as a junction onto the Rimma Trade Route. It then connected the colony with the planet Malastare back in the Mid Rim, which acted as a junction onto the Hydian Way.
The Biox Detour was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
